name: Welcome to Industrial Waters!
description: Lore: You are an engineer and your government sent you to an unknown planet. This planet is exposed to a lot of radiation so you have to stay UNDER THE SURFACE (water). Your objective is to build basic infrastructure so others can move in. Click the export button to continue.

name: Collect Iron Ore
description: Mine Iron Ore using the solid drill. You can place it by dragging it to the grid. To configure the drill, use the middle mouse button. And put it inside a collector. Belts can be drawn around machines with left mouse button. Machines need maintenance. If a machine stops working, middle click it and click repair.

name: Collect Iron Ingot
description: Use the iron ore to make iron ingots using the smelter.

name: Collect Mezholium
description: Mezholium is a local type of rock. You can get it from liquid drills.

name: Collect Copper Plates
description: Use the same procedure as iron for getting Cu ingots, then put them into the manufactury

name: Congratulations this is the end
description: We hope you liked this short demo
